data.question: What is the empirical formula of the synthesized cobalt fluoro sulfate?
At what temperature does the magnetic ordering occur for the Co4F4 cubane chain?
What is the overpotential required by CoSe2@ST to achieve a current density of 10 mA cm−2?
What method was used to synthesize CoSe2@HT?
What is the Tafel slope for CoSe2@ST?
What is the role of NaBH4 in the synthesis of CoSe2@HT?
data.answer: It acts as a reducing agent.

data.question: How does the electrochemical conductivity of CoSe2@ST compare to CoSe2@HT?
data.answer: CoSe2@ST has better electrochemical conductivity than CoSe2@HT.

data.question: Is the HER performance of CoSe2@ST better in acidic or alkaline medium?
data.answer: CoSe2@ST exhibited better performance in acidic medium.

data.question: Does the presence of an N-doped carbon matrix in CoSe2@ST improve its HER activity?
data.answer: Yes, the N-doped carbon matrix enhances the HER activity of CoSe2@ST.

data.question: Is the specific activity of CoSe2@ST higher than that of CoSe2@HT?
data.answer: Yes, CoSe2@ST has higher specific activity than CoSe2@HT.

data.question: True or False: The sealed tube method requires an external reducing agent for the synthesis of CoSe2@ST.
True or False: CoSe2@HT shows better electrochemical stability than CoSe2@ST.
True or False: The magnetic properties of the Co4F4 cubane chain are attributed to intra-cluster antiferromagnetic coupling.
True or False: The hydrothermal method produces CoSe2 with a carbon matrix.
True or False: The ECSA of CoSe2@HT is lower than that of CoSe2@ST.
True or False: The synthesis of CoSe2@ST is a solvent-free process.
True or False: The HER performance of CoSe2@ST deteriorates significantly after long-term stability testing.
What causes the better HER activity of CoSe2@ST compared to CoSe2@HT?
data.answer: The N-doped carbon matrix in CoSe2@ST facilitates faster charge transfer and higher electrochemical conductivity.

data.question: What is the charge transfer resistance (RCT) of CoSe2@ST?
True or False: The sealed tube method for synthesizing CoSe2@ST is performed at a higher temperature than the hydrothermal method.
